price: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mũsã ya zo muku da hujjõji bayyanannu, sa'an nan kuka riƙi maraƙi* (daga bãyansa, alhãli kuwa kuna mãsu zãlunci.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَكُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: * Riƙo A nan ma'anarsa bautawa; watau kõmãwa ga maraƙi da ibãda, ku bar Allah, bãyan Musa ya nuna muku ãyõyin Allah, yana ƙãra ƙaryata maganarku, ta cewa kunã yin ĩmãni da abin da aka saukar muku kawai. Dã kunã yin ĩmãni da abin da aka saukar muku, dã waɗannan abubuwa ba su auku ba daga gare ku.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāakum mūsā bil-bayināti thumma ittakhadhtumu al-ʿij'la min baʿdihi wa-antum ẓālimūna
